DOC.brief_title: IL-6 IL-8 Level Blood Pleural Effusion During Chemotherapy Metastatic Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: To assess correlation disease prognosis level IL-6 IL-8 blood pleural effusion chemotherapy patient metastatic breast cancer
DOC.criteria: Female 18 70 year old ; Patients histologic prove metastatic breast cancer ; Pleural effusion volume 1000ml , document CT , X ray ultrasound ; There diseases cause elevation IL6 IL8 , cirrhosis liver , anaphylactoid purpura , acute pancreatitis ; With least one measurable disease accord RECIST criterion , Normal laboratory result : ANC≥2.0×109/L , Hb≥80g/L , plt≥100×109/L , TB < UNL ( < 1.5 x UNL patient liver mets ) , ALT/AST < 1.5 x UNL ( < 2.5x UNL patient liver mets ) , AKP < 5 x UNL ( except bone mets ) , Cr < UNL ; Normal function heart , liver , renal bone marrow ; Got ICF enrollment ; Life expectancy 12 week . Pregnant breastfeed woman positive serum pregnancy test ; Uncontrolled brain metastasis ; No recovery previous radiation accept radiation within 4 week enrollment ; Participation investigational drug study within 4 week precede treatment start ; Concurrent malignancy sit previous cancer within last 5 year , exception adequately treat situ carcinoma cervix uteri basal squamous cell carcinoma skin ; Serious uncontrolled intercurrent infection ; Poor compliance .
